intro: Elatostema latifolium, commonly known as the broadleaf elatostema, is a flowering plant belonging to the family Urticaceae. It is characterized by its small, heart-shaped leaves that are often covered in fine hairs. The plant produces small, greenish-white flowers that are clustered in dense inflorescences. It is typically found in moist, shaded habitats in tropical and subtropical regions. Elatostema latifolium is often used in traditional medicine for its purported healing properties.
